评论概述: Much smaller than it appears in photos..
评论详情: It's very small, and I'm talking tiny. I can put a full size wallet in the large part and that's pretty much all. It's really lovely, looks well made but I must've gotten that "one" as the stitching on the front pocket has unraveled and now the pocket isn't usable. If it were larger and didn't have this problem, I'd be thrilled.. I'm not sure who measured this but it's not exact.

评论概述: Love this purse, but the straps
评论详情: I absolutely love this purse. I get so many compliments on it. It fits just what I need: wallet, phone, keys, chapstick, pen, and even a small journal on my coffee shop days.  The only reason I gave this purse a 3 is because the leather material on the strap started coming off after a year. I'm not rough with the purse and I don't use it all the time. To me it's not a big deal, you know you get what you pay for.
L loved the color and its a perfect size for church and my BIBle Study
Even for an inexpensive bag it looks a lot cheaper than it is. The material is stiff, and feels and looks like plastic. Don't waste your money.
I love it and it's a great size.
My husband got me this for the holidays and I LOVE IT! It fits two normal sized books or one big book. Bonus that it’s also gorgeous and completes my outfits!

Such a pretty bag with the perfect vintage vibe to match. The material is very nice and it does have a bit of weight to it as well, including the embellishments so for the price I paid it does feel worth it (as someone who does not own a lot of bags currently). I enjoy the design and the lock is a plus, although it may not close if there is too much stuff inside, however it can fit a decent amount.

评论概述: Cutest fricken bag you’ve ever seen
评论详情: Just got it and omg it is literally so cute. Leather is a bit stiff in the beginning so I’d definitely recommend breaking it out for a few days first but ugh it’s just so cute!!!
Christmas gift for 13 year old granddaughter, she began using it immediately and brought it to Christmas dinner. I love that she loves it. It is nicely made and very stylish.
bought this as a gift, it looks very special and differant, well made

评论详情: Great item
Such a beautiful purse I am so pleased with my purchase. Exactly what I was looking for! (:
I Loved it! The size, the color and how elegant it looks.

This purse exceeded my expectations. The sturdy craftsmanship, zipper, clasps, pockets....wow, what an awesome little Christmas gift to myself. Very vintage and really beautiful. Now I want it in every color!
Arrived early , love the purse and how it is made

Purse came exactly as pictured. I often purchase Ecosusi bags, I'm a big fan! I've been using their purses for years and have a variety of colors. I always get lots of compliments and have never had issues with shipping.

评论概述: I recently purchased the ECOSUSI Women PU Leather Satchel Purse, and I couldn't be happier with it!
评论详情: Firstly, the vintage design is absolutely stunning. I love how it adds a touch of sophistication to my outfits, whether I'm heading to class or running errands.In terms of functionality, this bag strikes a great balance.I can easily fit my wallet, phone, makeup essentials, and even a small notebook! I can carry it for hours without any discomfort, which is perfect for my busy days. It’s a fantastic value at the price, and it's become my go-to bag for everyday use. Definitely worth the purchase!
Not only is it a cute shape there's also plenty of room.
The smell when I opened the package was so nice. It's well made and the perfect size. Strap is super long though.
Excellent quality. Damaged twice from shipping. I couldn’t use
The design to get in and out of the bag and the pocket size is poor.
Sturdy & sophisticated (; I love it ^~^
Love it in the picture but when I got it, it was much smaller than it appeared in the picture. Hardly held anything

I bought this back in college, probably 2015-2016. I LOVE this purse. I still get compliments on it to this day. It was closer to $25 at the time (yay inflation!) but it is so worth the current cost. It’s held up great, even when I’m dropping it or tossing it around. I consider it my go-to purse. It matches everything, it holds everything, it cleans easily, and it’s a timeless look while still having a bit of personality. It’s got some puckering of the “leather” from age, and the strap has a string or two that have popped up. Both of those only if you look closely. But for nearly a decade of daily wear in all weather, from college parties and tiny lockers at minimum wage jobs, all the way to being worn into the office or out on date night with my husband- I’d say that this purse had held up beyond my expectations. I can not recommend this purse enough. Every time I go out to get a new purse, I’ll use the new purse for a few weeks before coming right back to this one. The size fits everything I could ever need and it’s so comfortable to carry. I fully expect it to last me another five years before I finally have to buy another. 5/5 stars!
Such lovely and quality item, appeared as describe and wore it everytime outside! ^^
Style & color are beautiful,  but it couldn't hold all my stuff.
Honestly, I just love this satchel so much. It is beautiful leather. Such a bargain for the price.
Latch broke right after my return window closed..cute purse but it only lasted a month

I bought the brown satchel purse. I like it for its vintage look. I get a lot of compliments on the purse. It is small inside. There is only one big pocket on the middle inside and it doesn't expand much. I had to downsize what I put in my purse. There are two pockets on the outside. The long strap is excellent, it really works well as a crossbody bag.  Please note that to open the purse you have to undo two snaps and a little lock. It's a little time consuming when you are used to just pulling on a zipper.
The strap is too long, and the material very stiff. hard to put anything in, and take out.  Was not able to return, had no choice but to throw it away.
Really like the quality make of this purse,  however when you put thins in it, like your wallet,  it becomes hard to latch.  It is a classic look though!!

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my cousin, who adores the Dark Academia aesthetic, and she absolutely loves it! She was especially impressed by the initial leather scent. It's surprisingly spacious—able to fit a good-sized book, phone, wallet, and a few extras, with room to spare.
Great quality, no issues. My favorite purse.

This bag is exactly what I was looking for in a bag. It's the right size, color, has a crossbody strap and a handle. I love that there are multiple color options and a different style for when one needs a fancier bag. The ONLY thing I'm not loving about this bag is the inner lining. It is loose. I have to fight with that to find anything in the bag. I took 1 star off for the inner lining. It really should be tacked down and fitted to the sides of the bag, instead corners were cut in the making of this bag by leaving it loose and flimsy, where stuff gets lost in the folds of the material.
Good quality bag.  I always receive lots of compliments on it.  Perfect size.  The magnetic snaps are strong and the front buckle is unique!

评论概述: So cute but broke so quick
评论详情: I held off switching bags too long because, well busy month and then a week into using one of the snaps popped off. I didn't notice it happen either so it's gone :( really bummed because it was so cute but if it doesn't clip it flops around and looks silly. If you do get it just be super super gentle. It is adorable but just not quality. Sadly I just passed the return window since I held off on using it.
Beautiful bag but with in a week one of the fasteners for the latch on the front fell off

I absolutely love this purse. The feel, the space, the hardware.  All exceed my expectations.  The leather feels like it is of great quality and will only get better with time. Adjustable strap allows for shoulder or cross body.

The purse itself is gorgeous, but it’s not holding up like I would expect leather to. I’ve had mine for two days and it’s already starting to fall apart. Also, as others have said, the straps are way too long.

I've had this purse for 2 months and it's already ripping at the corner seams. I wanted a smaller purse but I can barely fit my wallet and eyeglass case in it. The side buckles get stuck on the part that opens and the strap buckle snags my long hair. I had high hopes since it took me so long to pick a purse just to be disappointed and it not even last that long.
Fell apart after 24 hours.
Very durable and looks just like the advertisement. I’ve gotten many compliments and it’s the perfect size for me.

I get so many compliments on this bag! It's my go to to dress up an outfit. It's just big enough to fit my phone, wallet, keys, sunglasses and my Kindle. The flap can be a little hard to close while you're wearing it as it can get stuck around the long straps, but it's a minor inconvenience. 10/10 recommend!
You can only carry a wallet, phone and lipstick and pen
I had the brown one which was showing wear and tear so i ordered the white black one. Every time  i carry it i get compliments. Very practical too.

Such a cute purse! It's the perfect size, preventing me from overloading it. Still fits my phone w/case, large wallet, keys, and a few things in the pockets. I had to get used to the lock on it, but I absolutely love it. It's still a zipper closure under the flap, then the lock & heavy duty magnets. Those magnets alone are amazing. I feel confident that nothing will ever fall out & assured no one can try to steal anything if I were to leave it in the cart while looking at items on shelves. If you are a go-getter type person, want efficiency & try to be quick about things, this purse would drive you nuts lol. But if you want something trendy, very well made, & don't mind all the extras, you will love it ❤️

The purse is smaller with a lower capacity than I would have liked. I'm going to need a larger bag, but I'm keeping this one for a simple purse (wallet, phone, keys only) because it is lovely, well made, and of quality materials.  The strap is VERY long, as I had read in other reviews, and with the purse being so sturdy, it means it can hit HARD. Please take that into consideration when purchasing.  Otherwise, if you're looking for a lovely, small purse that looks classic and will stand the test of time, this could be the bag for you!
Ordered this for my daughter. Her review is:  Love this bag. It’s very roomy but don’t put too much weight in it. Great for daily use, cosplay and it’s fairly cottage core-esqe.
It's really nice buy really small. I don't have too much stuff and the bag is absolutely full no space left. (Phone, wallet, bag of tissue and car key).
It’s cute but it didn’t come with a strap. I’m not sure how to contact the seller and figure it out but it was advertised with the strap so I feel like it should have one
Absolutely love this purse, quality is great. craftsmanship is beautiful. Perfect for a wallet, your phone keys etc.. Not too small and not too big. Great price and fast shipping.
It's a very cute purse if you don't carry a lot of stuff. I only use it when I go out not for an everyday use since i carry a lot of stuff in my purse

评论概述: Looks amazing but wish the strap was more adjustable
评论详情: This looks great and is built well, but the strap can only be adjusted via a few holes on it. Because of this, even at it's shortest length it hits the back of my leg when I'm walking (I'm very short) and it's leaving bruises. I might switch out the strap with another, which you can thankfully do easily, so just something for any shorter folks to keep in mind before buying! I would still say it is worth the purchase though!
Love how much this cute bag hold and keep getting compliments on it
I got this as a gift for my mom and she loves it. She puts a lot of things in her purse and it has great space and is ver durable. The material is great as well.
Simple, yet very stylish purse. Good leather and beautiful color
Super cute handbag, but I’ve only had it a few months and the handle tour off. Super sad because I really like it.
The bag is beautiful and it is just the write  size I got a lot of compliments on it goes with everything I wear

This purse is amazing! It's super cute and elevates any fashion style. I love to wear it with academia outfits. As you can see in my pics, it goes great with skirts or pants. It's very sturdy and high quality. Mine is perfect in every way!
Bought this purse and it is great quality for the cost. I have gotten many compliments on it. Holds all my needs and is water resistant.
It’s able to fit my Bible and journal in perfect!
The strap is a bit long and needs more holes to shorten.
It’s very cute and it’s a nice quality. The size is not too big or too small. Has good size compartments.
This was a Christmas present and now the 4 edges of it are coming open.
It didn't look like the picture.
Very cute and stylish purse. I started using it immediately. I like the option of crossbody or just using the purse handle. Worthy purchase.
I love the quality of the bag. Very well constructed. Nice color contrast, strap is long enough for true cross body for plus size I individuals.

This is one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon. I bought the brown and the coffee. They are exactly as pictured. They are vintage looking, unique, beautiful, and the perfect size for every day use! The strap on the brown bag is superior, in my opinion. It's wider, sturdier, and adjusts shorter. The strap on the coffee bag is thinner, which is no problem, but the strap is a bit long for someone 5'4" or under, imo. Nonetheless, both bags are great and you won't regret purchasing either one. I also bought the Ecosusi Vintage Crossbody Handbag Briefcase for when I have more stuff I need to carry with me.
Love the quality and size so much.

i would not purchase again. i’ve had this bag since july of 2022 and i think i used it for about 6 months before i tucked it away in my closet. after about 4 months, the straps started to peel and made it look tacky when wearing.

评论概述: Peeling 2 days after 30 day return window…
评论详情: Very cute, bought because I liked my mother in laws at Christmas…2 days after the return is up and it’s peeling now…I had purses from Payless that lasted me years!…This purse is very poor quality!
A nice bag you can take anywhere! Not too bulky or too small, and well made.
I was excited but the match is broken. Not really sure how to fix it so I’m returning it.
Wish it was an inch or two bigger

The quality, smell, feel, and look are all 5/5. It has an interior zipper, exterior closure, crossbody strap and two extra buttons on the exterior. Le pickpockets in Paris would have a hard time getting in it.
Very cute bag that fits a lot

Let me start by saying that I loved the look of this purse. The quality is very good as well. I did end up returning it for 2 reasons. 1. It was just a little too small for me. 2. The clasp wasn’t lined up right and it was nearly impossible to close. For that reason, I gave it 3 stars. I could foresee it breaking in the near future because of the struggle to close the clasp.
It was smaller than I thought.  Also I guess I may have missed that the two buckles were magnetic and not just for looks.
It is very cute. Durable. Lots of space.

I was so tired of the long straps of my purses always twisting and slipping from the position I wanted them to be.  I love the satchel straps.  They are so easy to handle and no adjusting necessary.  They do include a long strap if you prefer.  I have received many compliments on this purse.  The craftmanship is excellent and it is very sturdy. I would highly recommend to anyone tired of struggling with the long straps on most purses.

Beautifully crafted purse, on the small side, but practical. It has a long adjustable strap, perfect for taller women like myself. It has a very academia esthetic which is what I was looking for. 10/10

I got it because I was tired of carrying things around in a little plastic bag. I love the over all look of this bag. I spent a whole month deciding on whether to get it or not. I looked for many other satchels but I always kept coming back to this one. I figured that was a sign that I should just get it. I'm glad I did. I'm not used to wearing a purse so it's taking some getting used to. I prefer to carry it like a briefcase as opposed to over the shoulder but more often than not, I end up putting it over my shoulder anyways. But I digress. It's got a good amount of pockets and space. The front clasp isn't so easy to open and line up when closing with having to actually look down at it and watch what I'm doing. I'll come back to edit this review after I've been using it for a few months, just to explain how it's held up to wear and tear.
I have had this purse for 4 months and it is already falling apart. I take good care of my stuff so this is just poorly made.
Exactly as picture. Loving it so far. Worth the price.

评论概述: The beauty and ease of getting into this bag
评论详情: Loved this cute purse
My daughter was so happy with this handbag. It is beautiful and good quality.

It’s sooooo small I thought it was going to be bigger and even thought it’s cute it’s just not usable for me  you can maybe fit a wallet and a lipstick nothing more I’m really bummer this will be going back

This purse is like stupid cute. The style is exactly like how it looks in the pictures. It also matches my new style (1930's vintage tomboy) so well. The only thing that might be a sucky is you can't really adjust the length that much. The strap is belt like with only a certain number of holes in it. So it can be kind of long if you have it over one shoulder but works well when it is across your body.
Well made
A beautiful staple for every season. I love it!
Exactly as pictured and exactly what I was looking for. I needed a bag that would coordinate with my resort vacation apparel. Classy, versatile, functional and fashionable.
It is beautiful. I bought this for my granddaughter because she picked it out. It is well constructed and very pretty

This purse is a favorite for sure. It is so cute, I get compliments anytime I am somewhere new.. Not only does the brown one I purchased go with about everything, it fits all my essentials comfortably and then some. I love to take it on vacation because of the way it closes, it latches and makes me feel that it is secure. I travel for work and nothing slides out when the plane lands or takes off under my seat. Definitely my favorite bag for the last month!!!

评论概述: Clasp is questionable, but the bag overall is good quality
评论详情: I love this purse, but it is very very small. I can fit my keys, sunglass case, and wallet in it, and then some female products in the pockets and that is it. Unfortunately, the first purse I ordered from them the metal clasp broke within a week of use. Very disappointed since this is what keeps this version of the purse closed. There are no magnets. I ordered another purse from them too that is slightly bigger. I use that one more in the winter since I have to carry around my gloves and hat in it. They will not fit in this purse. This one I am planning on using this one in colder months. I am hoping the clasp does not break on me again though and I just got a bad part. I rather not have to buy another purse for a while. I give the bag a 3-star rating because of this just because the bag so heavily relies on that clasp.  But other than that, the bag is super cute. It goes well with my rustic style. The leather is still in good quality. I also own one of their backpack laptop briefcases and have used it for about 3 years now. It's starting to fall apart but I loved it.

Pay attention to the dimensions of the purse. They are correct, but if you look at the pictures of the ladies holding the purse, it appears much bigger than it is.  It’s nice, but I bought it based on the pictures and I didn’t look close enough to the stated dimensions and I was disappointed. The purse doesn’t hold all of my things.

I love purses, and I have bought several from Amazon. THIS one is by far my favorite. While I have others that go with specific ensembles, this one can match both dressy and casual outfits, as well as jeans.  This purse is medium-small, which is really what I want. It's enough to hold everything I need, but definitely will not hold extra. It has 3 inside sections, a tight outside back pocket, and a front outside pocket. I put my wallet in the middle inside section, and some lipsticks and pressed powder in the other two. The back outside pocket is just a tight strip, so you can only fit a couple of business cards in it. In the front outside pocket, I put my phone. I can get to it without having to unzip the inside pockets.  I hang my keys on one of the metal loops on the sides, but the loops are also for the removable shoulder sash if you want to use it as a crossbody bag.  The material is real embossed leather, so it has some heft. I like that the style is a small version of an "academic satchel bag" carried by the stereotypical Ivy League professor in a wool jacket with patches on his sleeves. (Yes, that was the exact look I was going for!)  The quality is great. The leather is beautiful. I would not only recommend this little purse, I'm going to buy the black and white version and the red and brown version.
Purse is awesome. I am a purse lady and this is my everyday bag i use. Not big but big enough for all my daily needs.
It was purchased for my teenage daughter. She loves it.
Love this purse!! It's the perfect size not to small but big enough for my large wallet with some room for some other necessities. I've had so many complaints about it and the quality is excellent.

It's very cute, and certainly like the picture. But it's also much smaller than advertised. So I'm in this weird middle ground where I think it's so cute I don't want to send it back(plus that seems like a hassle). But it isn't big enough for my needs.... I usually have a big messy purse that I lose things in... but that's how I like it. This purse can barely hold my phone ☹️, I have a galaxy note 20. Verrrry nice quality though. Feels like genuine lackered rawhide, although I know it's not.
